wikipedia_page.main: Claire McGill MLA is a nationalist politician in Northern Ireland. She sat in the Northern Ireland Assembly from 2007 to 2011, representing West Tyrone as a member of Sinn Féin.McGill also represented Sinn Féin for the Glenelly Electoral Area on Strabane District Council from 2001 to 2011.
